Package Craps

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutCraps
    Class: AboutCraps File: AboutCraps.java Description: A form to display information about the Game of Craps and what this application simulates.
    CrapsGUI
    Class: CrapsGUI File: CrapsGUI.java Description: This program is designed to simulate the game of craps.
    Die
    Class: Die File: Die.java Description: A class to calculate random numbers of 1 through 6 to be used in the main class for when simulating a random dice rolls.
    PrintUtilities
    A simple utility class that lets you very simply print an arbitrary component.
